channel.title: Glock's Sprinting Animation
channel.description: So, I finally figured it out why Gordon only runs with one hand when using a Glock. The left hand is on the very very very lower left of the view model. It can be clearly seen if you are using a 21:9 Monitor, and is looking up.

item.title: Glock's Sprinting Animation
item.dc:creator: Nevermore2790
item.description:
So, I finally figured it out why Gordon only runs with one hand when using a Glock. The left hand is on the very very very lower left of the view model. It can be clearly seen if you are using a 21:9 Monitor, and is looking up.
